author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 45-year-old weaver, who sexually assaulted a nine-year-old girl in 2014 in Tiruchengode, was sentenced to undergo seven years imprisonment by a court here on Friday.

The prosecution case was that Kaliyamoorthy of Kumaramangalam committed the crime when the girl was alone at home on February 8, 2014. Based on her mother’s complaint, the Tiruchengode Rural police registered a case and arrested Kaliyamoorthy.

Sessions Judge – Fast Track Mahila Court S. Manvizhi found him guilty and sentenced him to seven years imprisonment besides a fine of Rs. 2,000. Later, Kaliyamoorthy was lodged at Coimbatore Central Prison.

A court in Salem awarded seven years imprisonment to a 47-year-old man for sexually assaulting a six-year-old girl in 2013. P. Murugan of Edapadi committed the crime on April 8, 2013.

The girl’s father lodged a complaint with the Sankari All Women Police Station who registered a case. Sessions Judge, Mahila Court R. Vijayakumari sentenced him to undergo seven years imprisonment besides a fine of Rs. 10,000.

Later, he was lodged at Salem Central Prison.
title: Sentenced for sexual assault
